timeline.message: unify timeout config in cluster plan executor
Merge branch 'cluster_new' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into cluster_new

timeline.bodyText: It would be better if you enforce the parameter in the constructor to be TSocket, so there will be less chance to trigger a ClassCastException when the code is modified by another person.
timeline.author: jt2594838

timeline.bodyText: The same transport is used in both input and output, so it is unnecessary to set twice.
timeline.author: jt2594838
